hello.

for those interested in URI Templates and Template Descriptions, 
http://dret.typepad.com/dretblog/2012/12/structuring-uri-templates.html 
might be interesting to read. feedback (on the blog on on this list) 
would be greatly appreciated, in particular real-life feedback how 
people manage reuse across URI Templates.

thanks and cheers,

dret.
